greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: A000012 * A054525 regarded as infinite lower triangular matrices.
formula: Recurrence: T(n, k) = If n >= k then If k = 1 then 1 - Sum_{i=1..n-1} T(n, k + i)/(i + 1)^(s - 1) else T(floor(n/k) else 1)) else 0). - _Mats Granvik_, Apr 17 2016
example: First few rows of the triangle are:
mathematica: Clear[t, s, n, k, z, x]; z = 1; nn = 10; t[n_, k_] := t[n, k] = If[n >= k, If[k == 1, 1 - Sum[t[n, k + i]/(i + 1)^(s - 1), {i, 1, n - 1}], t[Floor[n/k], 1]], 0]; Flatten[Table[Table[Limit[t[n, k], s -> z], {k, 1, n}], {n, 1, nn}]] (* _Mats Granvik_, Jul 22 2012 *) (* updated _Mats Granvik_, Apr 10 2016 *)
xref: Matrix inverse of A176702. [_Mats Granvik_, Apr 24 2010]
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Oct 31 2007
